feed.title: Radarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.22.4.9896
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 981a3c2db392099394c4c0b7c182b190877ae3f1 Fixed: Selecting No Change for quality profile inputs
  • 3f2ea56bf9e7ba82facbb9cdd01a0318682093ba Clear collection changes on add movie modal close
  • 1679ed1327569617bf8dabba8001eea3f039f6a0 Automated API Docs update
  • 69a1c1b21b1b2ad9b243635f0d1c189d1054f2be Custom format scoring is not usable on movies index
  • 5bd51832a0ddc3d5c1c1ffda91a913572c686e21 Bump version to 5.22.4
  • 52a69b662d56c800e19568075625f7fbcccb5e47 Convert Add Movie from collection to TypeScript
  • 7e34d89069d92cdf156e8307f2e578a43691f367 Convert Movie Collection Menus to TypeScript
  • b0024b28a5f4d47bd1ac67df5bc2e8d484fa7d0d Movie file is optional on movie resources
  • ae5450f75d64470670f6811839b9b89877a31518 Convert Edit Movie Collection modal to TypeScript
  • 1d1aca1a04e5ac11e18967ed0460d80e90aa7bdd Convert Collection Footer to TypeScript
  • 3a55316adad51b677b09b236759b765e10dce649 Improve typings for select options
  • 9ef7c2a0b4b2fd176bfddbc4c3d7db9c01a1913e Fixed: Autotagging using tag specification
  • e759f3fd0b6bb6255bdc3771d42f3b558bd5ceba Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 03429db8775aa040828eb20c2257eb8ae3ae9b66 Fixed: Prevent new imports without deleting old movie files
  • bb5f421e384b7be23d4e8cd7f90b6cb092e52ff5 Log when expected movie file is missing from disk on upgrade
See More * 7dd3ed815ae9419f6166e15b005e74a885e69aad Convert Modal components to TypeScript * cc56482819a90055c85172e1add9d6b33de5f19b Translate settings for Radarr import list * 40f41847fd59ae75747601d1942a8cf8d94ed6c8 Fixed: Selected value for empty root folder inputs * 8485fc8c75f9da478f8f7975680146699b27e02a Fix various typos * f3026df65d97466f97eb041068f9d07bf9604625 Automated API Docs update * cfd25e974f4e3bd706a5329d201f26b9eaafb618 Fixed: Free space and missing for selected root folder value * c52f9c5ec46bf8f520c984bc09fa6d8bba316873 New: Ability to change root folder when editing movie * b91517afd55b91a62dffc7e4a79e1c7e76e4504c Add React Query * ee8aaadb29068a934503597f8b42d1c09cdcf6cf Fix editing import lists * 0694f2fa76e3cad6674beb7edf3c60a5803a04d5 Convert ProviderFieldFormGroup to TypeScript * 2c81f3be0f8f7a5982b16822fb88bf86e8514d03 Improve typings in FormInputGroup * 8fb2f64e98ebc175832a299f3aba480fbff5faa5 Fixed: Tooltips for detailed error messages * efd2b80e1043f13b7d58056aa7e28f988646cffd Fixed: Truncate long text in tag values * a9bbe06966b7b476b6166738e4f8d9ba3b50e0ab Fix: Adding a new root folder from add movie modal * 4c6f80b308dd923df6f6c8e060492044b64fcd3f Fixed: Closing on click outside select input and styling on Library Import * c8299f7e575222f8797530f345558c16d0a45d0e Convert Form Components to TypeScript * 445babbca83510d616e174568faeab4ed13a02b7 Fixed: Parse JAP instead of JPN as Japanese * e5137d13e9e4b8074a95ac3556f33532feee1bf8 Bump version to 5.22.3 * fb8f8f4dd3b5ca532214a23ba5fec461ec91cae0 Ignore version check on non-Sqlite platforms for recommendations * 2b8ca4746a938a8e0c257f6731ca9f9c88df1235 Eager load metadata for movies * 9231a0e5265f8f9e1c592ca27955685d9b07b908 Fixed: Improve times for refreshing movies * 9fa75f0539d1928b9209aaf7300650f5a63ce5dc Fixed: Updating minimum size on sliding quality size limits * 76b556812930420be90d98b890e384ce24306b21 Bump IPAddressRange, System.Memory and System.ValueTuple * 27efe506a7633a7a5d63dd92062c6d210412fc89 Fixed: Sending Manual Interaction Needed for Custom Script with unparsed movie * d9be54575a99ba7be025dfdf2ac0eed9a81b7430 Bump Selenium.WebDriver.ChromeDriver * a825b9651851784f7e56249e2ba58987a2390e8d Automated API Docs update * 221b7a430000ecae93f4fa35afd03e534d68e8fe Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 1ac784e323bbc529537240a82d4cc5c1cc94ebb2 Update WikiUrl type in API docs * aae34f4c432bd7f21ea067ca06f6f5e74c7e2be4 Simplify props for MovieInteractiveSearchModal * 7219648fea57076bb9f376d2c290b06c757d9f11 Fixed: Set output encoding to UTF-8 when running external processes * b7be80744c874b2b80cc66890e4e802538e9afb1 New: Prevent Remote Path Mapping local folder being set to System folder or '/' * 29ca18d3f3094f72880795427c916e0f7a5c5287 Fixed: Parse EN from release titles as English * d9704a999dba8e5e68f42c185ba07b641995c1db Fixed: Remove support for IMDb Lists of the form 'ls12345678' * a23983032a6ba979095ef4b96d7e5f9b72ca8387 Log delete statements only once * 99d68cfd91145efccc19f4febbe3b92e59ce0505 Fixed: Disallow tags creation with empty label * 9c009a84f214e0895cd6b401881a905781b8b29c Bump version to 5.22.2 * e8ca64fabc190c72ba03a7daba1f51abc430c931 Fix typo in IMDb List validation message (#11024) * c821541a2f78c571caff53bebd79676f6c1e3bf2 Fixed: (PTP) Parse neutral leech releases * c10aadcc7bc38604014bdd4fc96fea1c4081246b New: Auto tag movies based on studio * 4a2202ed7fbddc012918d8b269f061e8d89c2e65 New: Parse original from release name when specified [ #10673 ] * 78c009d6faae44119a01470b6308ce54a2decef4 New: Parsing releases with 4K in square brackets as 2160p [ #7848 ] * e03289abe76c72046b93a73bab3afd557912177c Fixed: Prevent exception when grabbing unparsable release [ #10789 ] * da2ce10c68f5c6c08a1502ec9decad6828da9a45 Refine localization string for IndexerSettingsFailDownloadsHelpText * 6d34f2afb18e831c6ff25c91e86e5825ea4a131a Clean up media cover service fixture * 49b0c9639c70e9cf6bb012cf458e6ca6aa7f3116 Fix media covers test * c281e68b9f738a031f310ccb8dac4505edf13fbc Simplify last write time for media covers * 740d3ce88c2f1fb75952694eeb52e7affa910170 Bump linux agent to ubuntu-22.04 * ad7b85f76da4270171e15fac077a5b2a363e31ae New: Indexer flags in webhook for grabbed releases * 3aa93e79461b694ffb4a4139b526645e0942a946 Fixed: Improve error message for queue items from Transmission * bc08b0b2e1382abaa458c998a7ddeea104c92dc3 Fixed: Avoid requests without categories for FileList * 107f84330382e9d371bf43410b5a148cf9c9a277 New: Add Urdu Language (#10957) * 16b6997b142156df607ea47a02b432f76804bb26 Fixed: Deprecate Media Browser / Legacy Emby metadata * a5bcac5de913111c9aa63b6bc60100c143834d32 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 1e10d569c8b12660d208ebe3a10478a6d06f9558 Bump version to 5.22.1 * 74d2259f6710fd08df12922f67b164c5d4b3f72d Avoid fetching movies twice on initial load * 6e68a919223c8580a87440b73f2279144461621e Fixed: Avoid stale movie statistics on movies index * a962de776b21095a98463421d120bed7e02a34cb Movie updates already done in MovieControllerWithSignalR * e8afde2e90353515b48b2468d3f8e8d1b472fa92 Add XML declaration and clean up Kodi metadata generation * 4633a834f3219d35ceb2bd723009dfb412687898 Save Publish Dates as UTC for grabbed movies * cd021961f0e905563314f09fb69610772cbe5b96 Fixed: Deleting movie folder fails when files/folders aren't instantly removed * 456ea3d57cfc78539fd98596e89a5827c932c08f Fixed: Manual importing queued items with movieId to avoid title parsing [ #10931 ] * d09fa6f880801867f19f6af99b41f3d916961938 Cleanup unused sorting fields for bulk manage providers * bcd4fe1f08cb5af347700a70d087aaeb84ff4d77 Fixed: Priority validation for indexers and download clients * 8efce689226282d6f80126c63571b17ed6f1e333 Fixed: Trakt yearly lists no longer supported * 4b3c29ed9399157fcd6a966dcd86db2306dabffb Fixed: Allow tables to scroll on tablets in portrait mode * 7ea9161779637b1fb7d35786e5dd19cb48249a64 Bump browserslist-db * f5c66c509302c07b59f96cc50cb65041faa76bef New: Show size in history details * a3515db9f7a4af9704c13df23a7bacade6a668f5 Show Remove Failed option in torrent download clients * d4bb318253423b8a19602475a745a6be1128d72e Fixed: Prevent exception for seed configuration provider with invalid indexer ID * 64e865f29675dd89b4372b0942c1555e6b837b3a Enhance failed download warning for items not grabbed by Radarr * 982f9062bd1a1c7fce7ccf946453f6723a01fc0e Fixed: Downloads failed for file contents will be removed from client * 48075e33acc89c3989267ecefad6cd85e4f7d023 New: Option to treat downloads with non-media extensions as failed * 91f08a83cd9fa27c88df423792cdbb0fa655c1fa Bump version to 5.22.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Radarr/961c82cf-1428-4ab0-9257-63be1671eac8/_release?releaseId=168&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.23.3.9987
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • e0b93a03fdc699185120785cb77e2fc94efc1fb9 Remove create_test_cases.py
  • f7f5837d49d320deec7c44543030336bf7caa9b4 Convert Missing to TypeScript
  • c3ee8b3c906b2234eb3c63ae9b56001b0af3a475 Convert Cutoff Unmet to TypeScript
  • 4de78e3bab50d3d87d35ea34a747d1d3bcc1bb55 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 426538c8af826dde49cada2dcba6b15aed75d424 Remove console statement
  • c82404c75b9d6ee9c1bf4351daec9342a0bb07e7 Fixed: Loading suggestions for header search input
  • 9bee9841c1dd6974a4a8ccb9324f0a31af3d06fd Fixed: (PTP) Download torrent files with API credentials
  • 010959d915aad3903d0ac6253fbf783b50d98c7d Bump @babel/runtime
  • a6007289169e64b6bf4d29ed6087cdbd6e3c4058 Bump react-virtualized to 9.22.6
  • bbfb8c7cc2e7d48633120ffcce0f2d59f587f373 Bump babel, fontawesome icons, fuse.js, react-lazyload, react-use-measure and react-window

a5e5a63e452394f5fd74aba100077f2b6d33a5c5 Fixed: Upgrade notification title for Apprise * 31b44d2c2e6dd5ee48897b0c1ad896cfb6908fde New: Include movie poster for Apprise * 5303a1992cbeb78755ca52e46e9e32aaefe193dc New: Add Romansh language * 042308c3192c0f45e6459db10ad8a871cf638a8d Bump version to 5.23.3 * 2e97e09f44e059e59c709067100beff80ca2edf0 Fail build on missing Improve messaging when NZB contains invalid XML * c2c3dfe917bbcc50c2012f977e52b39a3554522c Avoid varying logging message template between calls * c58a9b3f2c1f144dd198b3af6a76510f817c34d9 Pass messages with arguments to NLog in LoggerExtensions * 65a532a7fda58d8cf08e421989c410924ddcfa59 Fixed: Sidebar flickering on mobile * 704d920dab0ed3e5ff14eb3940c07eff8f7e5a00 Remove unused preload.js * generated](https://dev.azure.com/Radarr/961c82cf-1428-4ab0-9257-63be1671eac8/_release?releaseId=172&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.24.1.10017
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • c92d8c08f115e0b88a6214b9e4b4d5d5d6586904 Follow redirects for usenet grabs on non-prod builds
  • 358ce92f85c33ae247d97f97ce5739a11e37788e Fixed: Production builds erroneously marked as not Production [ #11089 ]
  • 3ec5a4b78ae5bd5b7a91a208d2be9f3ba7f304dc Automated API Docs update
  • cb59ce891aa056c947ef8d82fb6e75e898d5d06e New: Keywords custom filter and autotagging for movies
  • 4d3d46d796ce30338fea8b063c897089bda355de Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 0941e51d2765ea30260494c57e774e4ec1386ec1 Bump version to 5.24.1
  • ff393a3f650e8d8ff16444af9e56a070d8503c01 Show movie titles when poster is missing on collections page
  • f5faf52469f17c8597bb5eebbb6aafd8fb62d12b Fixed: Update AutoTags on movie add (#11079)
  • b5b4d4b971fad2f1e7cb10bb6b2a8536ac4ca23b Return error with missing field for movie files endpoint [ #10555 ]
  • 873299701b8b62a1a5530d2bec935cf2288245ba Use UTC dates for TMDB Popular lists
  • d14cca30d7e26a2df83ea586e8b84f8911a4beac Use the thrown exception in http timeout handling
  • 5af61b59001fb47120a29e215f4876d14c7d46d9 New: Ignore volumes containing .timemachine from Disk Space
See More * a10759c7e983ae71980a61f0049d0fa332476872 Treat HTTP 410 response for failed download similarly to HTTP 404 * ac2d92007e1654d82cd576296406981f331e0066 New: Don't allow remote path to start with space * 09cfdc3fa2c85b66120b37ff51c3942dd935d84e Increase maximum backup restoration size to 5GB * 04f26dbff7d442ac050b5f40604be7b8c137f831 Ensure Custom Format Maximum Size won't overflow * 159f5df8cca6704fe88da42d2b20d1f39f0b9d59 Fix jump to character for Collections and Discover * b823ad8e6513dc7cd784b6750cc3483b899d3d57 New: Add Mongolian language * cc8bffc2729f5101ad83d420499431b3f1307287 Bump version to 5.24.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Radarr/961c82cf-1428-4ab0-9257-63be1671eac8/_release?releaseId=175&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.25.0.10024
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • afbe0ebcd44b341dda8c4e609fec2156f3644c4b Fixed: Validation for remote path mapping [ #11092 ]
  • bfbb7532a2077053e9c22217620cd7e549a8ed0a Bump version to 5.25.0

This list of changes was auto generated.

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.26.2.10099
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

7e541d4653cb13aee912f56764d516dc1e4b17bd Fixed: Display media info bitrates in bits (#11087) * 1cc2237ac0634b925fceb8379ef3027992e26c68 Bump version to 5.26.1 * 9df23686011cba299b67c6162137fe7ef4e74c74 New: Release type options for Calendar page * e7d76350ecbdda0ae44d7ebd19046a0cdfe38476 New: Release type options for Calendar Feed * fd3828ff5da447f5cbbb89f79fea7ef1e8106c66 Update translation tokens for release dates on poster options * 368e1fead82cbc483960f0b53320d509fb6261dc Fixed: ISO language code for Bengali *
